dt-example.title: Column Filter Integration
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows how the `columnFilter` feature can be used with searchPanes. By setting the `viewTotal` config option to true the count will display the count in that style, `cascadePanes` could also be activated to only show options present in the table.
